TABLE.NAME: dp_template
TABLE.COMMENT: Templates store configuration options for a group of plans.

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: User readable name for this template

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: A shorter name for this template (optional)

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when plans based on this template start by default

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when plans based on this template end by default.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to determine the order of the templates when displayed together

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: To allow templates to be hidden

FIELD.NAME: workflow
FIELD.COMMENT: Current workflow for this template

FIELD.NAME: isdefault
FIELD.COMMENT: To indicate if this is the default template

TABLE.NAME: dp_plan
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores individual plans belonging to users.

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the template used by this plan.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user this plan is for

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of this development plan

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of this development plan

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the start date of this plan

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the end date of this plan

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the completed date plan

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Integer code indicating the state of the plan

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: Integer to identify if the plan has been create by an automatic process

TABLE.NAME: dp_permissions
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the permission settings for plan templates

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the template that this permission setting is for

FIELD.NAME: role
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of a development plan role, not moodle role.

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Shortname of component this permission is related to. Same as folder name in components or plan if related to the whole plan.

FIELD.NAME: action
FIELD.COMMENT: Shortname of the permission to be set

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Integer value representing the permission, or null if not set

TABLE.NAME: dp_component_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the names and component-independent settings for each installed component.

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies which template this component setting is for.

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Shortname of the component

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls if this component is available or not

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls the ordering of components, used when displaying component tabs.

INDEX.NAME: templateid-component
INDEX.COMMENT: Prevent a component from being included in a template more than once.

TABLE.NAME: dp_course_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains settings specific to the course component

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the template these settings should be applied to

FIELD.NAME: duedatemode
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines how due dates are handled by this component

FIELD.NAME: prioritymode
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines how priorities are handled within this component

FIELD.NAME: priorityscale
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the scale used by this component

TABLE.NAME: dp_plan_course_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores courses assigned to a particular plan

FIELD.NAME: planid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the plan this course is attached to

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the course being assigned

FIELD.NAME: priority
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the priority of this course within the current plan.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the date this course is due to be completed.

FIELD.NAME: approved
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates if the course has been accepted as part of a plan, or is awaiting approval.

FIELD.NAME: reasonfordecision
FIELD.COMMENT: The reason for approving/declining the request

FIELD.NAME: completionstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: Stores the course completion status at the moment the plan is marked as complete. Set to null before the plan is complete.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Stores the course grade at the moment the plan is marked as complete. Set to null for active plans.

FIELD.NAME: manual
FIELD.COMMENT: Was this assignment made manually

INDEX.NAME: planidcourseid
INDEX.COMMENT: Index on courseid. Ensures each course is only shown once per plan.

TABLE.NAME: dp_plan_competency_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores competencies assigned to a particular plan

FIELD.NAME: planid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the plan this competency is attached to

FIELD.NAME: competencyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the competency being assigned

FIELD.NAME: priority
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the priority of this competency within the current plan.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the date this competency is due to be completed.

FIELD.NAME: approved
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates if the competency has been accepted as part of a plan, or is awaiting approval.

FIELD.NAME: reasonfordecision
FIELD.COMMENT: The reason for approving/declining the request

FIELD.NAME: scalevalueid
FIELD.COMMENT: The final id of the proficiency scalevalue. This field is used as a snapshot field, for saving the proficiency, after the plan has been completed

FIELD.NAME: manual
FIELD.COMMENT: Was this assignment made manually

INDEX.NAME: planidcompetencyid
INDEX.COMMENT: Index on competencyid. Ensures each competency is only shown once per plan.

TABLE.NAME: dp_competency_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains settings specific to the competency component

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the template these settings should be applied to

FIELD.NAME: autoassigncourses
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to determine if linked courses should also be added when competencies are auto assigned

FIELD.NAME: duedatemode
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines how due dates are handled by this component

FIELD.NAME: prioritymode
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines how priorities are handled within this component

FIELD.NAME: priorityscale
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the scale used by this component
